sentences.en: A baby cannot use articulate speech.
After the injury the bones did not articulate as well as before.
sentences.cn: 受伤后骨的关节不如从前连接的好.
清楚的表达能力是非常重要的.

sentences.en: Articulate your words carefully so that everyone in the room can understand you.
sentences.cn: 要仔细地吐字,发音清晰,使室中每个人都能听懂.

sentences.en: He is polished, charming, articulate and an excellent negotiator.
sentences.cn: 他文雅、迷人、能言善辩，是一名优秀的谈判人。

sentences.en: He was so drunk that he could barely articulate his words.
sentences.cn: 他醉得话都说不清楚了。

sentences.en: His voice was shrill, but very clear and articulate.
sentences.cn: 他嗓音尖锐, 但是嘹亮而清晰.

sentences.en: Many people are unable to articulate the unhappiness they feel.
sentences.cn: 许多人都表达不出内心的痛苦。

sentences.en: Mary is the most articulate of the sisters.
sentences.cn: 玛丽是姐妹中最会说话的.

sentences.en: She is an articulate young woman.
sentences.cn: 她是个善表达的年轻女子。

sentences.en: She is clearly the most articulate and self-possessed member of her family.
sentences.cn: 显然，她是全家口才最好、最沉着冷静的人。
她的能言善辩令人敬畏。

sentences.en: She struggled to articulate her thoughts.
That man is not very articulate.
The backbone is an articulate structure.
sentences.cn: 脊椎骨是一种关节相连的结构.

sentences.en: The child was unable to offer an articulate description of what she had witnessed.
sentences.cn: 孩子无法对她所目睹的事情作出清楚的描述。

sentences.en: The president has been accused of failing to articulate an overall vision in foreign affairs.
sentences.cn: 总统因未能清晰表述对外交事务的整体构想而受到指责。

sentences.en: With unity Europe was bound to articulate its own identity.
sentences.cn: 实现了联合,欧洲必然表明自己的一致性.

words.tran_cn: 铰接式的；清晰的；组织缜密的；有关节的
关节的；分节的；发音清晰的
发音之人或物；发音纠正器；接骨的人
铰接（articulate的过去分词）；明确地表达；使相互连贯
发音清晰的；口才好的；[动][生物]有关节的
发音；清楚地讲话；用关节连接起来

trans.tran_cn: 发音清晰的；说话表达力强
trans.tran_en: to express your ideas or feelings in words

trans.tran_cn: 善于表达的，发音清晰的
trans.tran_en: writing or speech that is articulate is very clear and easy to understand even if the subject is difficult
to express your ideas or feelings in words

trans.tran_cn: 发音清晰的；口才好的；有关节的
trans.tran_en: to pronounce what you are saying in a clear and careful way

trans.tran_cn: 明确有力地表达； 清楚地吐， 清晰地发
trans.tran_en: to express your ideas or feelings in words
